sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) Once per round, the character may voluntarily suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficulty of his next Mechanics check (or his next check to build or mod an item) by one, to a minimum of Easy (1 purple d8)</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Master artisan</name> <number>TAL0001079</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 03:57:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d031ec78db224c542901de90cf961948</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 03:57:08</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
